general.name: NetLogix - Agent Health Direct-Check [WIN]
general.description: Use Direct-Check to check a Windows system's connectivity to the Datto RMM platform alongside a series of other checks designed to ensure the system is working at its best. Errors found will be populated into StdOut and, if enabled, a UDF, the contents of which can be cross-referenced at https://dat.to/ahckey.

variable.name: usrUDF
variable.description: What UDF (1-30) to put summary data into. Leave at 0 to not write a UDF.
